notes.title: Conflict of interest
notes.p: The authors declare that they have no conflict of interest.

notes.title: Animal and Human Rights Statement
notes.p: The whole study was approved by the Administrative Committee on Animal Welfare of the National Institute for Viral Disease Control and Prevention, Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention (Laboratory Animal Care and Use Committee Authorization, permit number 2016022910). All institutional and national guidelines for the care and use of laboratory animals were followed.
